    • Constructor Detail

      • PanoramaParameters

        public PanoramaParameters(GeoPoint observerPosition,
                          int observerElevation,
                          double centerAzimuth,
                          double horizontalFieldOfView,
                          int maxDistance,
                          int width,
                          int height)
        Constructs a new PanoramaParameters
        Parameters:
        observerPosition, - a geopoint corresponding to the position of the observer
        observerElevation, - the observer elevation in meters
        centerAzimuth, - the center azimuth in radians
        horizontalFieldOfView, - the horizontal field of view from the observer in radians
        maxDistance, - the maximum field of view from the observer, in meters
        width, - a sample that indicates the width of the panorama (a double)
        height - a sample that indicates the height of the panorama (a double)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the observerPosition is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the azimuth is not canonical
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the horizontalFieldOfView is not between 0 and PI/2
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either maxDistance, width or height are negatives
